titleStmt.title: Bromelion A discourse of the most substantial points of diuinitie, handled by diuers common places: vvith great studie, sinceritie, and perspicuitie. Whose titles you haue in the next page following.
titleStmt.author: S. I., fl. 1595.
Bèze, Théodore de, 1519-1605. Summa totius Christianismi. English.

notesStmt.note: "Of predestination", a translation of "Summa totius Christianismi" by Théodore de Bèze, p. 249-343.
The last two leaves are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
